page.title: 08Changes in the area
page.content: Most changes have taken place in the use of buildings in the area.Over the past 10 years the residential area has doubled in size without a corresponding increase in industry.In fact local industry has declined. One of the major local changes has occured with the closure of{Silas {Dykes Glove Factory}.This building has also housed a print shop employing 15 local people.The factory is to be redeveloped into luxury flats and both the gloving and printing firms will move outside the area. Another major change was the closure of the 100 year old Church School in 1981.It now houses a{Video Library},a {Mail Order firm}for film memorabilia and{an 8 track Recording Studio}all of them are doing very well and have been made most welcome in the village as a sign of new investment here.
